error.message: The "app.root" service is deprecated in drupal:9.0.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use the app.root parameter instead. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3080612

Call to deprecated function drupal_set_installed_schema_version(). Deprecated in drupal:9.3.0 and is removed from drupal:10.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Update\UpdateHookRegistry::setInstalledVersion() instead.
Missing explicit access check on entity query.
Value of core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 is not compatible with the next major version of Drupal core. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
